lead_paragraph: The American forward Brian McBride scored his fourth goal of the season last night, leading Fulham past Arsenal, 2-1. McBride headed in Claus Jensen’s corner kick in the sixth minute, and Tomasz Radzinski made the score 2-0 in the 19th minute. Manchester United maintained its 3-point lead over Chelsea in the English Premier League by beating visiting Everton, 3-0. Host Chelsea beat Bolton, 1-0.
